message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and potential impact on your business, I estimate its true value to be far beyond its cost. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the tangible benefits but also the intangible value it can bring to your organization. I trust that you will find this investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.
